pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'R x C Ecological Inference With Optional Incorporation of Survey Information' // Fits the R x C inference model described in Greiner and Quinn (2009) DOI:10.1111/j.1467-985X.2008.00551.x and Greiner and Quinn (2010) DOI:10.1214/10-AOAS353. Allows incorporation of survey results.
